ai-tha-ap501:1.4_0: like a tree at the foot of a tree.
ai-tha-ap501:2.2_0: I’ll cover it with a sharp knife,
ai-tha-ap501:2.3_0: I was walking up and down the path,
ai-tha-ap501:2.4_0: or stood in the mango grove.
ai-tha-ap501:3.4_0: I went to the realm of the Thirty-Three.
ai-tha-ap501:4.3_0: and wide heaps sixty leagues away.
ai-tha-ap501:5.2_0: which delights in the heavenly realm.
ai-tha-ap501:5.4_0: acting as ruler of the gods.
ai-tha-ap501:7.1_0: ascending the palace of the Dhamma
ai-tha-ap501:7.3_0: if you’re wishing to live together;
ai-tha-ap501:7.4_0: in the dispensation of the Sakyans.
ai-tha-ap501:8.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap501:10.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap501:12.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nandā.
ai-tha-ap501:13.1_0: for the Elder Nun Nun Cūḷaka River of Flowers,
